articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: Israel launched a major air and ground offensive against the Iran-backed group Hezbollah in late September.
articles.title: Lebanon awaits truce proposals after US envoy expresses hope

articles.author: Jeff Mason
articles.description: President Joe Biden will host President-elect Donald Trump at the White House on Wednesday for a meeting designed to demonstrate a smooth transition between administrations despite Trump's team not yet having signed documents to start the handover process.
articles.title: Biden, Trump to meet at White House for transition talks after Harris defeat

articles.author: Nidal Al-Mughrabi
articles.description: Israeli forces deepened their incursion into Beit Hanoun town in the north, forcing most remaining residents to leave.
articles.title: Israeli forces kill 14 people in Gaza, force new displacement in the north

articles.author: David Lague
articles.description: Modernized versions of China’s H-6 bomber are capable of launching ballistic missiles with nuclear warheads.
articles.title: Cold War bomber enhances China’s ability to strike U.S. bases

articles.author: David Kirton, Nicoco Chan
articles.description: The attack happened as Zhuhai captured China’s attention with the largest aviation exhibition.
articles.title: Zhuhai car attack: China clears memorial as government scrambles to respond

articles.author: Ope Adetayo
articles.description: Unrelenting price rises and a brutal insurgency had already made it hard for Nigerians in northeastern Borno State to feed their families. When a dam collapsed in September, flooding the state capital and surrounding farmland, many people ran out of options.
articles.title: Millions of Nigerians go hungry as floods compound hardship

articles.author: Lucinda Elliott
articles.description: World leaders are heading to South America for twin summits this month, with one major theme dominating: Donald Trump 2.0.
articles.title: Trump 2.0 looms as world leaders head to South America for summits

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: The United States wants real and extended pauses in fighting in Gaza so assistance can get to people who need it, but the best way to help people would be to end the war, U.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken said on Wednesday.
articles.title: US wants real, extended pauses in fighting in Gaza, Blinken says

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: It is up to the United States to decide what to do with Taiwan's decommissioned HAWK anti-aircraft missiles, the island's Defence Minister Wellington Koo said on Wednesday, when asked if they would be transferred to Ukraine.
articles.title: Up to US to decide what to do with decommissioned HAWK missiles, Taiwan says

articles.author: Reuters
articles.description: North Korean soldiers have engaged in combat operations against Ukraine alongside their Russian allies, South Korea's spy agency said on Wednesday.
articles.title: South Korea says North Korean soldiers are fighting Ukraine forces
